amendment.description: Amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: 7, 9, 12, 13, 16, 17, 18, 21, 27, 29, 34, 35, 36, 37, 38, 39, 41, 44, 47, 48, 49, 54 and 57 printed in House Report 110-666 and printed on pages H4746-H4753 of the Congressional Record dated May 22, 2008.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered en bloc: 7,9,12,13,16,17,18,21,27,29,34,35,36,37,38,39,41,44,47,48,49,54 and 57 printed in House Report 110-666.

action.text: On agreeing to the Skelton amendments (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
